sentences: Pigistas minu kätt nii kõvasti, et hakkas valus.
Talupojad seisid kõvasti oma õiguste eest.
context: Kõvasti is an Estonian adverb that expresses intensity, strength, or degree in various contexts. It can mean physically strongly or firmly (like tightening something), emotionally intensely (fear, fatigue), volitionally determinedly (standing up for rights), or even quantitatively greatly or a lot (many animals, much rain). The word modifies verbs to indicate how an action is performed with significant strength, intensity, or quantity.
